name: Pocasset Smoked Bluefish Pate
author: IANNACONE
summary: The added flavors (onion, cognac, etc.) accentuate but don't overpower the smoky goodness of the fish.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ pound skinless, boneless smoked bluefish, flaked
directions: Blend cream cheese and butter in a food processor until smooth, 10 to 15 pulses
Add cognac, lemon juice, onion, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and pepper to cream cheese mixture; pulse until blended, scraping down sides 2 to 3 times
Sprinkle fish into cream cheese mixture and pulse just until blended
Transfer pate to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, 3 hours to overnight
